meanings.definition: The art of cutting and folding paper to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent1: She learned kirigami in art class and made a beautiful paper butterfly.
meanings.sent2: Kirigami is a fun way to create unique decorations for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The kirigami master accidentally cut the paper in the wrong place, creating a funny-looking shape.
meanings.sent4: Her kirigami skills were like a magic trick, transforming plain paper into stunning artwork.
meanings.sent5: The intricate kirigami patterns seemed to dance and come alive in her hands.

meanings.definition: A paper craft similar to origami but involving cutting as well as folding.
meanings.sent1: He enjoyed the challenge of kirigami, carefully cutting and folding the paper to create a 3D effect.
meanings.sent2: Kirigami allows for more creativity than traditional origami due to the cutting involved.
meanings.sent3: The kirigami project turned into a hilarious mess when he accidentally cut the paper in the wrong places.
meanings.sent4: Her kirigami creations were like puzzles, with each cut and fold adding a new piece to the design.
meanings.sent5: The kirigami artwork popped off the page, showcasing the artist's skill and imagination.
